member.name: P:AnimeCompatibility.Logging.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets the logger that the AnimeCompatibility library should use. Logging can ease troubleshooting. Setting this property to null is shorthand for setting it to a Common.Logging.Simple.NoOpLogger. If a logger is never set, a Common.Logging.Simple.NoOpLogger is used.

member.name: M:AnimeCompatibility.MyAnimeListApi.GetAnimeListForUser(System.String)
member.summary: Anime lists are cached for the lifetime of this MyAnimeListApi object.

member.name: P:AnimeCompatibility.GoodOkBadAnime.GoodCutoff
member.summary: Good anime is greater than or equal to cutoff

member.name: P:AnimeCompatibility.GoodOkBadAnime.OkCutoff
member.summary: Ok anime is greater than or equal to cutoff, less the good cutoff
